type: Public address system Sept-Iles Terminal - RFP
short_summary: Acquisition of equipement and services needed for the extention of the useful life of the Public adress system of the Sept-Iles Terminal
description: EF997-241054 Public address system Sept-Iles Terminal - RFP
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to acquire equipment and services required to extend the useful life of the public address system at the Sept-Îles Terminal.

### Key Details
* **Tender Title**: EF997-241054 Public Address System Sept-Îles Terminal - Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is open to suppliers from Canada and other countries that have a trade agreement with the Government of Canada.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: This opportunity is specific to the Sept-Îles region.
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not provided

## Tender Requirements
The required equipment and services include those necessary to extend the useful life of the public address system. The successful supplier will need to demonstrate the ability to provide the required equipment and services, as well as provide a detailed proposal outlining their approach and pricing.

## Important Dates
* **Publication Date**: December 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 22, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Attachment
Please refer to the attached document for the detailed RFP and terms of the contract. Note that this tender is open to qualified suppliers, and the procurement process will be managed in accordance with the Government of Canada's procurement regulations. It is the responsibility of the supplier to review and comply with all applicable rules and requirements.
